programme.title: Climate carnage: whose job is it to save the planet?
programme.desc: In a crucial year for the climate, award-winning Guardian environment editor Fiona Harvey reflects on 30 years of Cops and meets the politicians, activists and scientists asking who is responsible for saving the planet.

programme.title: Daisy Chain: Can a Cornish town adapt to survive another lockdown?
programme.desc: When the remote town of St Just, Cornwall, was locked down in March 2020, the small community worried that its economy wouldn't survive.

programme.title: Swipe my race | Conectifai | Muslim Americans on life after 9/11
programme.desc: Swipe my race: 'If you're only dating someone for their skin colour, you should consider why' | Conectifai | Muslim Americans on life after 9/11: 'The toll has been huge'

programme.title: Why is big tobacco booming? | Campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets
programme.desc: We're quitting smoking, so why is big tobacco booming? | Kids v cars: the campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets

programme.title: I was a terrorist - now I run a kindergarten | Finland the best place in the world to be a parent?
programme.desc: I was a terrorist - now I run a kindergarten | Is Finland the best place in the world to be a parent?

programme.title: La caravana: On the road with the migrant caravan
programme.desc: Thousands of migrants from Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala head north hoping to find work and a better life in the US.

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: Living in Britain, fighting for rights in Iran: 'lives that are lost are not in vain’ | Mould, cold and a community hub offering hope in the cost of living crisis

programme.title: The Pegasus project
programme.desc: A special investigation into NSO Group, which sells hacking spyware to governments.

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Ai Weiwei on Beijing: 'It's a prison for freedom of speech' | Antony Gormley: 'London is bought, developed and abandoned'

programme.title: Crossing the line
programme.desc: Episode one: Khaled's Ladder | Episode two: The story of Civil Rights is unfinished

programme.title: Crossing the line
programme.desc: 10 Middle Eastern artists undertake a road trip across the US, exploring common concerns between the US and the Middle East. Made in collaboration with Culturunners.

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: Why China just can't quit Hollywood | How Haiti came to be run by armed gangs | How killing vultures endangers humans | How the Italian mafia makes millions from tinned tomatoes

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Abraham Cruzvillegas: 'Mexico City is about to collapse… yet it's optimistic' | The truth about Tehran, by artist Nazgol Ansarinia: 'It's building a fantasy future' | Artist Doris Salcedo on Bogotá: 'The forces at work here are brutal'

programme.title: Can women save sumo? The crossroads facing Japan's national sport
programme.desc: The ancient Japanese sport of sumo is in well-documented crisis. Years of controversy and scandal have hurt the sport's ability to attract new talent.

programme.title: Desert Fire
programme.desc: Football’s world cup for unrecognised territories is viewed through the eyes of the manager and players of one of the most fascinating teams, Iraqi Kurdistan.

programme.title: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour
programme.desc: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour: my life as a female bodybuilder

programme.title: 2020: A Covid Space Odyssey
programme.desc: A short diary of astronaut Jessica Meir during her seven-month mission on the International Space Station (September 2019 - April 2020).

programme.title: The new green superpower? Oil giant Kazakhstan tries to wean itself off the black stuff
programme.desc: Kazakhstan is rich with oil, gas and coal but Nursultan Nazarbayev, its president for life, has committed the country to a dramatic shift from fossil fuels to green energy.

programme.title: Gay, black and HIV positive: America's hidden epidemic
programme.desc: If you are a black, gay man in America, your risk of contracting HIV is one in two. Leah Green travels to Atlanta, Georgia, which has the largest gay and black community in the country. She finds out how stigma, education and structural racism continue to feed into this startling statistic

programme.title: ASMR videos that give YouTube viewers 'head orgasms' | Psychology of queues and how to beat them
programme.desc: The ASMR videos that give YouTube viewers 'head orgasms' | After you: the psychology of queues and how to beat them

programme.title: Beyond bionics: how the future of prosthetics is redefining humanity
programme.desc: Bionic technology is removing physical barriers faced by disabled people while raising profound questions of what it is to be human. From DIY prosthetics realised through 3D printing technology to customised AI-driven limbs, science is at the forefront of many life-enhancing innovations

programme.title: The hunt for Europe's great white shark
programme.desc: American research group Ocearch has more than 15 years’ experience in catching, tagging and tracking great white sharks all over the world, contributing to filling in the many gaps in knowledge about the ocean predator.

programme.title: The Wolf Dividing Norway
programme.desc: With unique access to remote communities in the snow-capped landscape of Norway, this film follows characters on either side of a fierce debate on whether to cull the wolf population.

programme.title: Scavengers, miners, and climate activists: can Poland ditch coal?
programme.desc: Poland has a deep and historic relationship with coal, importing huge amounts despite producing yet more locally.

programme.title: Crannog
programme.desc: Alexis has a life-threatening disease. She spends her time in the wooded expanse of northern Scotland, where she takes care of dozens of animals who are also sick, wounded or dying.

programme.title: Will green technology kill Chile's deserts? | Florida Keys residents on life after Hurricane Irma
programme.desc: Will green technology kill Chile's deserts? | I'll be here until I die': Florida Keys residents on life after Hurricane Irma

programme.title: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation in underground music
programme.desc: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation: still the ultimate in underground music?

programme.title: Dearborn, Michigan
programme.desc: In the last 12 months the city of Dearborn, Michigan, has been thrown into conflict. At its heart, the conflict is about fear, ideology and identity politics – and what it means to be an American.

programme.title: The climate science behind flooding | My animals burned alive' in Greece's wildfires
programme.desc: The climate science behind flooding: why is it getting worse? | My animals burned alive: the man putting his life back together after Greece's wildfires

programme.title: Silent Sam
programme.desc: Sam is a 27-year-old music-teaching, sovereign ring-wearing, chanting Buddhist. He is the lead singer of an up-and-coming punk band - but he’s also mute... at least for most of the time.

programme.title: We Walk Together
programme.desc: Thousands of refugees were sleeping rough at Budapest’s Keleti station, waiting for trains to take them to western Europe. Then, they just got up and walked.

programme.title: Skip Day - High school friendship and everyday racism in Florida
programme.desc: Intimate glimpses of one very special day in the lives of high-school seniors from an industrial corner of the Florida Everglades.

programme.title: The secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'
programme.desc: Getting rid of the beard is a challenge: the secret world of Asian drag queens | Oklahoma rodeo: 'I can be gay and I can be a cowboy'

programme.title: Pressure and Release: horse therapy for young Indigenous Australians
programme.desc: The Kimberley region of Western Australia is a beautiful place. But it is home to communities in crisis – devastated by a pattern of suicides among young Aboriginal people.

programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: 90-year-old Colette Marin-Catherine confronts her past by visiting the German concentration camp Mittelbau-Dora where her brother was killed. As a young girl, she fought Hitler's Nazis as a member of the French Resistance.

programme.title: Flat Earth: meet the people casting aside 2,500 years of science
programme.desc: Though not a new phenomenon, flat Earth theory has enjoyed a huge resurgence recently.

programme.title: Fish story
programme.desc: Sometime in the 1980s, Caspar Salmon's grandmother was invited to a gathering on the Welsh island of Anglesey, attended exclusively by people with fish surnames. Or so he says. Thirty years later, film-maker Charlie Lyne attempts to sort myth from reality.

programme.title: World Cup Slaves
programme.desc: Nepalese men employed in Qatar's construction industry tell Robert Booth how they work for little or no pay as they build the infrastructure ahead of the 2022 football World Cup.

programme.title: Racing to keep our language alive: H̓ágṃ́ṇtxv Qṇtxv Tx̌ (We’re all we got)
programme.desc: There are only seven people left in the world who can fluently speak Marvin's mother tongue, Haíɫzaqvḷa. Out of 6,700 languages spoken worldwide, 40% are in danger of extinction.

programme.title: Cinema of Ukraine: artists reflect on modern history, culture and people
programme.desc: The Guardian is celebrating Ukrainian cinema with a specially curated selection of documentaries, made before the current war.

programme.title: Lives Instead of Knives: one woman's struggle to end knife crime
programme.desc: Smith's Farm Estate in Northolt, north-west London, has been the scene of multiple stabbings. After one murder came particularly close to home, community volunteer Jen Lock began a one-woman mission to end knife crime in the area. But, as she finds out, things don’t always go smoothly.

programme.title: 'Revenge pornography': Chrissy Chambers' search for justice
programme.desc: In April, it became a crime in England and Wales to post ‘revenge pornography’. Chrissy Chambers and her girlfriend Bria are YouTube’s most popular lesbian content creators.

programme.title: The case for language learning
programme.desc: Larry Lamb on languages | Are drugs the answer to language learning? | The US farm that teaches Yiddish to the world

programme.title: Black Enough?
programme.desc: Why do so many black people love Kung Fu movies? | Why are period dramas so white?

programme.title: Europeans
programme.desc: Sweden: We knew we were the best | UK: I'm British. Island mentality innit

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: The people against King Charles: how protesters are getting ready for the coronation | Are French protesters more effective? Meet the ‘next level’ climate activists

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Divided Cities
programme.desc: Divided Cities: The last divided capital in Europe | I had no idea hot summers could kill

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: City champions: 'Make them look twice and think twice' | How we've told the great story of urbanisation

programme.title: Speak your mind
programme.desc: Three-part series about body image, mental health and wellbeing.

programme.title: The Pegasus project
programme.desc: A special investigation into NSO Group, which sells hacking spyware to governments.

programme.title: Kherson: from heaven of Ukrainian liberation to hell of Russian bombardment
programme.desc: The southern city of Kherson was liberated from Russian occupation in November 2022 by Ukrainian forces, sparking ecstatic scenes in the main square.

programme.title: My weekend at man camp | Marching for LGBTQ+ rights in Orbán's Hungary
programme.desc: My weekend at man camp: trauma, wrestling and tears | Filthy Pride': Marching for LGBTQ+ rights in Orbán's Hungary

programme.title: Fifty years of gay liberation | Generation HIV
programme.desc: 'Come out! Come out! Come out!' Fifty years of gay liberation | Generation HIV: the young Britons born HIV positive

programme.title: The Trial
programme.desc: Alka Pradhan, James Connell and Sterling Thomas are lawyers for Ammar al-Baluchi, one of five men facing the death penalty for plotting the 2001 terror attacks in the US.

programme.title: Beirut Dreams in Color
programme.desc: Mashrou’ Leila were one of the biggest bands in the Middle East, with a lead singer, Hamed, who is the most prominent openly gay rock star in the Arab world. Known globally, their gigs were regular sell-out successes until an event at their 2017 Cairo concert changed everything.

programme.title: Globalised slavery: how big supermarkets are selling prawns in supply chain fed by slave labour
programme.desc: A six-month Guardian multimedia investigation has, for the first time, tracked how some of the world's big-supermakets are using suppliers relying on slave labour to put cheap prawns on their shelves. Slavery is back and here's the proof. Narrated by Benedict Cumberbatch.

programme.title: Fighting Shame
programme.desc: A group of women use everyday items to tell of the sacrifices and difficult choices they face, and the community initiatives they have launched in an attempt to tackle the shame surrounding poverty and make policymakers listen.

programme.title: I came out as HIV positive to break down stigma | Staged Sex: Role of the Intimacy Co-Ordinator
programme.desc: Lloyd Russell-Moyle tells Owen Jones: 'I came out as HIV positive to break down stigma' | Staged Sex: Role of the Intimacy Co-Ordinator

programme.title: "I want to bring up a warrior": Ukraine's far-right children's camp
programme.desc: In Ukraine, the far-right Azov militia is fighting on the frontline – and running a summer camp for children.

programme.title: The valley rebels
programme.desc: Cédric Herrou is a farmer who supports and houses African refugees in the alpine village of Breil-Sur-Roya in southern France.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W angielskim Costwolds do Deana i Adama dołącza wędkarz Matt Godfrey. Celem tej wyprawy jest lin, który musi ważyć ponad 2 kg. Chcą też złowić sandacza o wadze ponad 4,5 kg, zwanego rybą-wampirem.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: Załoga samolotu FedEx 705 wkrótce po starcie z Memphis musiała stawić czoła agresywnemu porywaczowi, jednocześnie starając się zachować kontrolę nad maszyną.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs ma poważny problem, Gold Gypsies stawiają wszystko na jedną kartę, a Rick daje z siebie wszystko, aby zakończyć sezon na plusie.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Na dalekiej północy stanu Queensland kierowca cysterny Steve Hughes tankuje paliwo, które musi dostarczyć klientom, zanim pora deszczowa uniemożliwi mu dojazd.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Firma buduje teraz z w wielu miejscach. Curzelowie — zwłaszcza Paolo — muszą jeździć po całym Trydencie, aby doglądać prac.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Lodowi wikingowie S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Załoga Chrisa wyrusza w poszukiwaniu nowych łowisk, pomaga im ojciec Chrisa, Robert. Czy uda im się znaleźć dobre miejsce i dokonać połowu, który pozwoli zadowolić klientów?

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W angielskim Costwolds do Deana i Adama dołącza wędkarz Matt Godfrey. Celem tej wyprawy jest lin, który musi ważyć ponad 2 kg. Chcą też złowić sandacza o wadze ponad 4,5 kg, zwanego rybą-wampirem.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep4
programme.desc: W czasie wielkiej ulewy Derek jedzie do Szkocji, aby odebrać jaguara E-type i rzadki kabriolet MGC. Dave znajduje rzadkiego austina gipsey.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: Załoga samolotu FedEx 705 wkrótce po starcie z Memphis musiała stawić czoła agresywnemu porywaczowi, jednocześnie starając się zachować kontrolę nad maszyną.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs ma poważny problem, Gold Gypsies stawiają wszystko na jedną kartę, a Rick daje z siebie wszystko, aby zakończyć sezon na plusie.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Na dalekiej północy stanu Queensland kierowca cysterny Steve Hughes tankuje paliwo, które musi dostarczyć klientom, zanim pora deszczowa uniemożliwi mu dojazd.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Firma buduje teraz z w wielu miejscach. Curzelowie — zwłaszcza Paolo — muszą jeździć po całym Trydencie, aby doglądać prac.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Lodowi wikingowie S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Załoga Chrisa wyrusza w poszukiwaniu nowych łowisk, pomaga im ojciec Chrisa, Robert. Czy uda im się znaleźć dobre miejsce i dokonać połowu, który pozwoli zadowolić klientów?

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W Chorwacji Dean i Adam są z wędkarzem Garym Newmanem. Tym razem celem wyprawy jest karp. Swoją krucjatę zaczynają nad pełnym ryb jeziorem i chcą złowić rzadkiego amura białego o wadze ponad 13 kg.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep5
programme.desc: W garażu na przedmieściach w hrabstwie Yorkshire stoi bardzo poszukiwane audi quattro. Z Irlandii Północnej przyjeżdża sunbeam, a Derek zakochuje się w rzadkim motocyklu z Francji.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs wyrusza do Kalgoorlie, aby zająć się obróbką wypłukanego złota. Kellie i Henri ścigają się z czasem, aby wydzierżawić obiecującą działkę.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Steve Grahame rusza w kolejną podróż po jednych z najtrudniejszych dróg na świecie. Dion Fisher, specjalista od transportu ciężkiego, musi przewieźć dwie gigantyczne, 40-metrowe konstrukcje.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: W środku nowego sezonu Paolo podejmuje się artystycznego projektu, który nieco go przerasta: ma zbudować drewnianą rzeźbę zaprojektowaną przez artystę Marco Martalara.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Lodowi wikingowie S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Temperatura spada poniżej -50 stopni Celsjusza. Trevor i Matt są pozostawieni sami sobie, kiedy ich transporter ulega awarii. Załoga Chrisa wyrusza na misję ratunkową.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: W czasie bitwy morskiej wojskowy operator radaru błędnie zidentyfikował zbliżający się cywilny samolot jako wrogi myśliwiec. Maszyna została zestrzelona, a wszystkie 290 osób na pokładzie zginęło.

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: Dean i Adam wyruszają w podróż po Anglii. Zarzucają wędki w rzece Trent i wodach Grand Union Canal. Nad jezioro Earlswood wybierają się razem z Tomem Dove'em i Steve'em Ringerem.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Derek odbiera sportowy samochód marki Morgan i spotyka gwiazdę muzyki pop. Do Thornton-le-Dale trafia ambulans z czasów II wojny światowej. Ford model T potrzebuje nowego domu.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs wierzy, że w tym roku zarobi milion dolarów. Gold Gypsies mają nadzieję, że nowa działka okaże się strzałem w dziesiątkę. Scrappers skonstruowali cały nowy system wydobywania złota.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Steve, doświadczony kierowca, ma poważne problemy ze swoją ciężarówką. Dion ma ogromne opóźnienie, a Joey przewozi niestabilny ładunek, który stale grozi przewróceniem się.

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: Nowej ekipie Giovanniego udało się wreszcie rozpocząć budowę modrzewiowej konstrukcji, która ma być podstawą rozbudowy schroniska Capanna Fassa. Budowla ma być lekka i wytrzymała.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Lodowi wikingowie S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Chris nie przestaje naciskać na swoją załogę, by ta zapuszczała się dalej na niezbadany lód. Tymczasem Mike i Justin starają się naprawić transporter, bo ich koszty rosną, a połowy maleją.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: W czasie lotu PA 434 samolotem wstrząsa eksplozja. Maszyna zostaje poważnie uszkodzona, załoga zmuszona jest do awaryjnego lądowania.

programme.title: Gwiazdy wędkarstwa
programme.desc: W angielskim hrabstwie Dorset do Adama i Deana dołącza Matt Godfrey. Tym razem wypłyną na łowisko nocą. Spróbują sił na morzu w Portland Bill, a w rzece Stour będą szukać kleni o wadze ponad 2 kg.

programme.title: Gruchoty za gotówkę
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Gruchoty za gotówkę S4 Ep7
programme.desc: W Hull na Mathewsonów czeka wrak klasycznego brytyjskiego samochodu sportowego, w którym rośnie drzewo! W północnej Walii Mathewsonowie znajdują hot hatcha, nietkniętego od niemal 20 lat.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs ma problemy. Scrappers wreszcie docierają ze swoją maszynerią na miejsce wydobywania złota. Do małżeństwa Teda i Lecky Mahoneyów dołącza ich córka Tyler.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Turbo jest gotowy na każde wyzwanie — z wyjątkiem czekania na wypłatę. Sharon, kierowca wywrotki, prowadzi 50-metrowy pociąg drogowy po wyboistej drodze. Yogi przeżywa wyjątkowo trudny tydzień...

programme.title: Górscy cieśle
programme.desc: W firmie Curzelów pojawił się nowy pracownik, który właśnie przeszedł trudne szkolenie Germano: Martin, najmłodszy syn Paola, jest gotowy do pomocy przy budowie schroniska Capanna Fassa.

programme.title: Lodowi wikingowie
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Lodowi wikingowie S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Załogi kończą sezon, mając nadzieję, że uda im się zrealizować kwoty połowów. Chris zastawia więcej sieci. Czy taka polityka się opłaci, czy okaże się błędem?

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: To miał być rutynowy lot na platformę wiertniczą, ale ekstremalne warunki pogodowe sprawiły, że śmigłowiec super puma zniknął z radarów...

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Ekipa Dirt Dogs ma problemy. Scrappers wreszcie docierają ze swoją maszynerią na miejsce wydobywania złota. Do małżeństwa Teda i Lecky Mahoneyów dołącza ich córka Tyler.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii

programme.desc: Turbo jest gotowy na każde wyzwanie — z wyjątkiem czekania na wypłatę. Sharon, kierowca wywrotki, prowadzi 50-metrowy pociąg drogowy po wyboistej drodze. Yogi przeżywa wyjątkowo trudny tydzień...

programme.title: Mission: Hurricane
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Mission: Hurricane | Hurricane Patricia
programme.desc: In 2015, Josh Morgerman traveled to Mexico to chase what would become one of the strongest tropical hurricanes ever recorded. His harrowing experience with Patricia would forever shape his identity as a Hurricane Chaser.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Sinister Storms | Destruction's Legacy
programme.desc: Journey through the aftermath of calamities, revealing the damage left in their wake.

programme.title: Sinister Storms
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Sinister Storms | Enigmatic Earth
programme.desc: Ride into the intense beauty and test the resilience of the natural world.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 4.13
programme.desc: Even if a snake is not poisonous, it should pretend to be venomous. Take a look at these limbless reptiles

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 1.5
programme.desc: Get up close and personal with the creatures that call your backyard home.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Storm Hunters | 1000 Year Storm
programme.desc: The Stormhunters find themselves knee deep in flood waters as historic rainfall threatens to wash them away.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Storm Hunters | Shifting Winds
programme.desc: Mark and Jaclyn make their annual trek to Tornado Alley and this time they are looking for more than severe thunderstorms and tornadoes. They also want answers as to whether Climate Change is causing changes to Tornado Alley.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Storm Hunters | Height of Ruin - Part 1
programme.desc: George joins Mark and Jaclyn on a journey to Nepal.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Storm Hunters | Ferocity in Florida
programme.desc: Following an intense hurricane season, Hurricane Michael is poised to hit Florida.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.desc: A white monster charges up the Eastern Seaboard, and 80 million citizens are in its path.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Storm Hunters | Fight or Flight
programme.desc: Doubt and disbelief plague the Stormhunters after an exhaustive chase through Tornado Alley. The team is forced to make an uncomfortable decision. Do they play it safe or push past their fear?

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Hellfire Heroes | What It Takes
programme.desc: Trouble during a training session; a rollover traps 4 people and ejects 2 others into a swift-moving river.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Risky Business
programme.desc: Pilot Peter Rosendahl combats gail force wind while taxiing a group of hunters to a floating lodge.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Into The Deep
programme.desc: The bush pilots have to use all their skills - scuba diving, underwater rigging and expert flying - to try and salvage a de Havilland Beaver wing at the bottom of the 6 Mile Lake.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Fight To Survive | Nightmare Canyon Pt. 1
programme.desc: Justin and Jeremy Harris' weekend decent into a remote Utah canyon becomes a survival nightmare when Justin severely breaks his leg. As night fast approaches and temperatures drop below freezing, how will these two brothers survive?

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fight To Survive | A River's Grasp
programme.desc: In an isolated mountain river, Fisherman Dean Ririe becomes hopelessly trapped under a boulder in water up to his neck. In icy waters that should kill a man, Dean fights for his life miles from help.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Captured: Extreme Weather | Off Guard
programme.desc: A catastrophic earthquake, a mesmerizing avalanche, a destructive tornado, and an unintentional smashup derby on icy highways; our experts weigh in on these viral videos as people get caught off guard by the sudden and powerful forces of nature.
