Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Hang out with Pinkfong and Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pinkfong Around the World
programme.desc: Guess where Pinkfong, Baby Shark and Sam are now? Follow them to the library, Kid's Cafe, Singapore and Malaysia.

programme.title: Baby Shark Toy Song
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark Toy Song
programme.desc: Have joyful learning and singing with Baby Shark and the Shark Family toy!

programme.title: Bebefinn Dino finger
programme.desc: Wow! There's Tyrannosaurus Rex coming out of TV!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.desc: Learn different colors with Baby Shark Brooklyn and Pinkfong!

programme.title: Veo Veo
programme.desc: Let's help friends in need while singing the 'Veo Veo' song with Pinkfong, Baby Shark, and the Super Rescue Cars! Let's all focuse on and see what items we need to find based on the hints given by Pinkfong and Baby Shark.

programme.title: Bebefinn Trex and Animal friends
programme.desc: Tyrannosaurus Rex! I’m the best hunter! Tyrannosaurus Rex! Who’s going to be my prey? Look at my mighty teeth,look at my mighty jaws. No one can run away from me! Roar!

programme.title: Pinkfong Car Mechanic
programme.desc: Welcome to the Pinkfong Repair Shop. Feel free to drop by!

programme.title: Let's Dance Along together!
programme.desc: I’ve got the rhythm in my elbows. Elbows! I’ve got the rhythm in my knees. Knees! I’ve got the rhythm in my feet. Stomp, stomp! Feet! I’ve got the rhythm in my eyes!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Let's Sing with Pinkfong
programme.desc: Everybody! Let's sing and dance with us!

programme.title: Poki's Toy Lab
programme.desc: A genius inventor Poki makes toys to play with Pinkfong and Baby Shark.

programme.title: Hide 'n Seek with Shark Family 4
programme.desc: Oh? Where did Baby Shark and Shark Family go? Help Pinkfong to find all the Shark Family!

programme.title: Baby Shark Special Song
programme.desc: Doo doo doo doo doo doo! For all fans who love our Baby Shark songs, here we are with baby shark songs compilation. Everybody, Let's go and have some fun!

programme.title: Super Safeguard Sammy
programme.desc: Help me, Sammy!' Our hero Sammy is here to rescue friends in need! Explore safety tips through lively rhymes and engaging games. Let’s get started!

programme.title: Pinkfong T-Rex Special
programme.desc: Roar! I am the best hunter, the Tyrannosaurus Rex, and no one can run from me!

programme.title: Ambulance Rescue Special
programme.desc: We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town!

programme.title: Best Baby Shark vs Thief Baby Shark
programme.desc: Let's sing and dance with Baby Shark! Best Baby Shark vs Thief Baby Shark Episodes Compilation

programme.title: Best Baby Shark vs Thief Baby Shark
programme.desc: Let's sing and dance with Baby Shark! Best Baby Shark vs Thief Baby Shark Episodes Compilation

programme.title: Bebefinn
programme.desc: Baby Finn Learns Something New Everyday with the Funn Family! Here comes another beautiful precious day of Finn, a Baby Shark lover just as our children, and his Family. Enjoy the daily life of the Bebefinn Family filled with joyful songs.

programme.title: Baby Shark Turned into a Cube
programme.desc: Where is your family hiding? Find it with Pinkfong!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lion's Share of Lyon
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italy's Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Pizza Party on the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up pizzas including a Detroit Style Pie, a Cheddar Naan Pie, and a French Bread Pizza.

programme.title: It's Taco Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale takes on tacos with a showstopping riff on al pastor: lemongrass and guajillo pork with pineapple.

programme.title: The Chicken Episode
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale kicks up the heat with his angry chicken recipe, a spicy, spatchcocked and grilled whole chicken.

programme.title: New Orleans-Style Shrimp & Oysters
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde he creates NOLA-inspired Oysters, Shrimp Po’boys, Bananas Foster, and a Fruity Hurricane.

programme.title: Vegetables, But Delicious
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale makes vegetables the main course with savory trumpet mushrooms and spicy ssam jang eggplant.

programme.title: Perfectly Prepared Steaks
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, & grill up the biggest and best steaks out there.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster & Prime Rib
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde preps perfect prime rib, lobster in chili sauce, charred green beans, & cheddar-stuffed rolls.

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab & Perfect Pork Belly
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes a fierce feast with chili crab, adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, & stuffed branzino.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde goes big with a dry-aged beef burger, a pork patty melt, & a crunchy mushroom tortilla burger.

programme.title: Beer Brats & BBQ Ribs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up cheddar beer brats, BBQ lamb ribs, watermelon soju punch, & warm crispy donuts.

programme.title: Apocalypse Burgers
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks off summer with a burger blowout featuring Brisket, Shrimp, and Lamb Burgers.

programme.title: A Cruciferous Delicious Time
programme.desc: No veggie family stands the test of time like the cruciferous family, and its hearty meals will win you over.

programme.title: 5-Ingredient Recipes
programme.desc: Less is more when it comes to simple weeknight meals that focus on maximum flavor and minimal ingredients.

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, one brother will live like a king, while the other will check out the city’s street food scene.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Basic Versus Baller: Travel at Any Cost
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Pierogies, Bagels, and Ramen in NYC
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza hits NYC as he samples warm bagels, pillowy pierogies, innovative ice cream, and real ramen.

programme.title: BBQ Bowls & Puffy Tacos in San Antonio
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza tries San Antonio’s best brunch, epic puffy tacos, colorful conchitas, & BBQ Thai curry bowls.

programme.title: Loaded Dogs & Classic Cocktails in San Diego
programme.desc: Frankie Celenza heads to San Diego to try modern latkes, loaded hot dogs, frosty snow ice, & French cocktails.

programme.title: Pho, Poke, & Pig in O’ahu
programme.desc: Frankie explores O’ahu island to get nourished from fresh tuna poke, heartfelt Pho, and hand-pounded poi.

programme.title: Quail, Alligator Sausage, & Gumbo in New Orleans
programme.desc: Frankie stops by New Orleans to chow down on lacquered quail, a beast of a Po Boy, and Creole Beef Daube.

programme.title: Salmon Tacos, Meatballs, & Perogies in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Frankie dazzles in Las Vegas enjoying crunchy salmon skin tacos, retro meatballs, red snapper, and perogies.

programme.title: No Kitchen No Problem
programme.desc: Frankie shows us easy and inventive “no-kitchen” hacks for delicious struggly meals. No Kitchen? No problem.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Learn how to make some inventive, flavorful mushroom dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25 and shows us how to prep some fan-favorite finger foods.

programme.title: Valentine's Day
programme.desc: Frankie prepares a Valentine’s Day dinner for under $15 with a bistro-style theme to up the romance.

programme.title: Winter is Here
programme.desc: It’s the dead of winter in Frankie’s kitchen, which means it’s that time for hearty, delicious, warming meals.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to cook with mother nature, spring-style.

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem: less waste, more food, and more nutrition.

programme.title: Cheesin'
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to stretch cheese in a dish so it can be the star without breaking the bank.

programme.title: Meat: More Bang For Your Buck
programme.desc: Frankie shows us which cuts of meat provide the most bang for our buck, and the best way to cook them.

programme.title: Frankie & Flour
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to make three different meals using flour as the affordable vehicle.

programme.title: Hotdishes
programme.desc: Discover Frankie's secrets to cook nutritious and cost-effective one-pot hotdishes.

programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to shop for and cook this filling, delicious and cost-effective ingredient: the eggplant.

programme.desc: Frankie shows us how to make five delicious lunches for the whole work week.

programme.desc: Frankie busts the myth that eating plant-based is expensive.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Heritage Monuments of Cairo and Luxor, Egypt
programme.desc: While the Pyramids of Giza, built as a royal mortuary, reveal the religious beliefs of Egyptian pharaohs, temples, like the Luxor temple, offer a glimpse of ancient Egyptian mythology. The monuments of Egypt are a testament to the different beliefs that have shaped this country.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Landmarks York Castle, England
programme.desc: Commissioned by William the Conqueror, York Castle in England has served as a center for regional governance, a royal mint, and a notorious prison.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 World Spas Chiva Som, Thailand
programme.desc: From an underwater therapy to a massage that detoxes internal organs, Jamie Srubis tries varied spa treatments at the Chiva Som resort in Thailand.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses (ENG)
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Xplore Belgium
programme.desc: The food, the beers, the chocolate and the fries. Bruges is one of the cities that seemed to have skipped 21st century altogether.

programme.title: Unplanned Trip
programme.desc: Roshni’s journey gets off to a rocky start in Jairampur when everything goes wrong.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Secret diving spots, under-the-radar lagoons, ancient Mayan ruins – there is a lot more to the Yucatan peninsula than Cancun and Playa del Carmen.

programme.title: Burn Appetit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Burn Appetit Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Chef Jolly, a UK-based Indian chef, decides to combine his love for good food and passion for motorbikes on an epic trip across Austria.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Bucket List Hitoyoshi, Japan
programme.desc: A classic steam locomotive leading you to a relaxing hot spring bath in the mountainside - sounds like a story, doesn’t it? Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty make this story come true with an onsen or a traditional Japanese hot spring bath in Hitoyoshi, an idyllic town surrounded by mountains and blessed with the Kumagawa river.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun HoChi Minh, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Ho Chi Minh, Rohan tries local delicacies like Tom Ray fish and lotus seed, and explores sights like the Cu chi tunnels and Reunification Palace.

programme.desc: The food, the beers, the chocolate and the fries. Bruges is one of the cities that seemed to have skipped 21st century altogether.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun HoChi Minh, Vietnam
programme.desc: In Ho Chi Minh, Rohan tries local delicacies like Tom Ray fish and lotus seed, and explores sights like the Cu chi tunnels and Reunification Palace.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Faction's film showcases pure creativity with thrilling freeski action. Get ready for non-stop excitement and jaw-dropping sequences! Don’t miss the ride!

programme.title: Against the Odds
programme.desc: Rising from rock bottom and defying the odds to shoot for gaming's biggest prize, this is how Team OG's unconventional esports approach led them to go for Dota 2 glory at The International competition.

programme.title: Toby Price: Ridin’ Shotgun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Toby Price: Ridin’ Shotgun
programme.desc: Toby Price, six-time winner on two wheels, tries to conquer the Finke Desert Race on four wheels. Can he overcome past setbacks and claim the title as the king of the Australian desert?

programme.title: Pushing Progression
programme.desc: Explore the evolution of breaking as Busta Rhymes and dancers from different generations discuss how it grew from Bronx backyards to global stages like Red Bull BC One. The journey is incredible!

programme.title: Encouraged: Building the Future
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Encouraged: Building the Future
programme.desc: Courage Adams returns to Nigeria to build the first skatepark in Lagos, giving local BMX riders a chance to push the limits and change the sports scene in their community.

programme.title: Beyond the Line
programme.desc: Join hosts Rob Warner, Emily Batty, and Eliot Jackson as they chat with Jolanda Neff, Oisin O’Callaghan, and Henrique Avancini about their careers and big moments in mountain biking!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The 2019 Red Bull Soapbox Race in Tokyo takes creativity to new heights! Watch racers speed down a tough, obstacle-filled course in this exciting and wild race. Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E01 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Join the action at the Red Bull Soapbox Race 2023 in Switzerland, where teams race homemade cars through tricky turns, blending creativity, speed, and a few crashes.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S11 : E03 Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Teams race homemade cars down steep hills in Norway’s Red Bull Soapbox Race. With sharp turns and big spills, who will be the fastest or the most fun to watch?

programme.title: Premier Padel 2025 Qatar Major Highlights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Premier Padel 2025 Qatar Major Highlights
programme.desc: Watch the fast-paced Qatar Major Premier Padel live from Doha. The sport is growing fast, don’t miss the chance to see top players compete for glory!

programme.title: Red Bull Guanajuato Cerro Abajo 2025 Highlights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Guanajuato Cerro Abajo 2025 Highlights
programme.desc: The thrilling urban downhill MTB race takes over the historic streets of Guanajuato, Mexico. Watch top riders speed through this UNESCO World Heritage Site, racing through 16th-century streets!

programme.desc: Join 250,000 runners in the Wings for Life World Run, all racing to find a cure for spinal cord injury. See this incredible event and be part of something amazing!

programme.title: IndyCar vs Formula 1 car: Technical Comparison
programme.desc: Which is faster: Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 car, or Scott Dixon's Indycar? Both have had major success in their respective championships, but how different are the two machines? Using our latest 3D animations, Jake Boxall-Legge breaks down everything there is to compare Indycar and Formule 1 cars, from aerodynamics, power, tyres, fuel and more.

programme.title: How Formula 1 Setups Change For Downforce Vs Power Tracks
programme.desc: What makes a Formula 1 downforce track different to a power track? We've all heard the terms before, but different tracks require vastly different car setups to get the maximum advantage around a lap. But what are these requirements? Jake Boxall-Legge dives into why Imola, Monaco, Silverstone and Monza all require different changes to a car to succeed across the board.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: Everything You Need to Know About TYRES in Motorsport
programme.desc: Tyres play a vital role in getting the driver from A to B in a race. Here's the rundown of the variety of tyres and how they are used across different motorsports. programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society. 0:00 A2RL - Autonomous Racing 1:00 What is A2RL and Why it's Different 3:05 The Challenge's Format 3:38 The Future of A2RL Beyond 2024 5:23 Interest from the World of Motorsport 6:44 The Tech Powering the Cars 7:44 How the Cars Drive...

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.desc: Which is faster: Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 car, or Scott Dixon's Indycar? Both have had major success in their respective championships, but how different are the two machines? Using our latest 3D animations, Jake Boxall-Legge breaks down everything there is to compare Indycar and Formule 1 cars, from aerodynamics, power, tyres, fuel and more.

programme.title: How Formula 1 Setups Change For Downforce Vs Power Tracks
programme.desc: What makes a Formula 1 downforce track different to a power track? We've all heard the terms before, but different tracks require vastly different car setups to get the maximum advantage around a lap. But what are these requirements? Jake Boxall-Legge dives into why Imola, Monaco, Silverstone and Monza all require different changes to a car to succeed across the board.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: Everything You Need to Know About TYRES in Motorsport
programme.desc: Tyres play a vital role in getting the driver from A to B in a race. Here's the rundown of the variety of tyres and how they are used across different motorsports. programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society. 0:00 A2RL - Autonomous Racing 1:00 What is A2RL and Why it's Different 3:05 The Challenge's Format 3:38 The Future of A2RL Beyond 2024 5:23 Interest from the World of Motorsport 6:44 The Tech Powering the Cars 7:44 How the Cars Drive...

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: Gérard Larrousse: Man of many racing talents
programme.desc: Peter Windsor meets Gerard Larrousse, the former rally driver, double Le Mans winner, F1 driver, Renault F1 Team Manager and F1 team owner, in his home in Marseille, France.

programme.title: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 1 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 1 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: ELMS 2024: Season review
programme.desc: Check out highlights from the 2024 European Le Mans Series.

programme.title: Robert Wickens - The Next Lap - Episode 1
programme.desc: In 2018, a horrific crash at Pocono nearly ended Robert Wickens’ life—and seemingly ended his racing career. He suffered a double spinal cord fracture, multiple broken bones, and a severe pulmonary contusion. By the end of that year, Robert revealed he was a paraplegic. But Robert Wickens is not like most people. This is the story of a man who refused to be defined by the crash that changed everything. Through unwavering determination, incredible resilience, and the cutting-edge technology of Bosch Motorsport, Robert set his sights on an unthinkable goal: to race again at the highest level. This isn’t just a story about recovery—it's about rediscovery. About holding onto your...

programme.title: Pikes Peak - The Mountain Decides
programme.desc: Renowned documentary film maker Jeremy Hart shows us the challenges faced from the Pikes Peak International Hillclimb, one of racing's toughest tests against the clock - featuring the recording-breaking Volkswagen I.D. R Pikes Peak.

programme.title: Thrill of the Race - Season 2: Episode 4 - Borderforce!
programme.desc: Thrill of the Race, episode 4 comes from Knockhill after a complete change in conditions throughout the weekend bringing a big challenge to the teams and riders! Plus the three races gave us three different race winners as now seven contenders have celebrated victory

programme.title: Behind The Visor with Nico Hülkenberg
programme.desc: He may have taken 3 years out of full-time F1, but Nico Hülkenberg certainly hasn't lost the motivation to push himself. Earlier in the year, we caught up with the Hulk himself, where Nico opens up on his early retirement the first time around, his comeback with Haas and his future with Audi in F1. He also talks to GP Racing about his life, what drives him and what is really important outside of F1. For this interview, we partnered with our sister team GP Racing Magazine. Check out the link below to read the extended interview with Nico and more exclusive articles! www.gpracing.com

programme.title: Why the 'second' Niki Lauda was even better than the first
programme.desc: As the Formula 1 paddock sets up in Monaco, the late Niki Lauda is not far from anyone's thoughts following his death earlier this week. Inside the paddock, Edd Straw is joined by Giorgio Piola, who knew Lauda throughout his F1 career, to get a very personal account of what it was like to know the three-time world champion. Piola explains what made Lauda tick, and how his accident in 1976 changed him into a new person who was "even more wonderful than the first".

programme.title: 9 interesting F1 tests that didn’t lead to anything
programme.desc: Formula 1 testing has thrown up some interesting car and driver combinations over the years, and as this list shows, plenty of top-name drivers have turned up in unexpected places. But sometimes a test deal catches the eye then doesn’t lead to a more permanent arrangement, for a wide variety of reasons. Here we take a look at nine particularly high-profile drivers who had a brief try-out with a team, but didn’t end up signing a proper deal

programme.title: The Best Looking F1 Cars Of All Time
programme.desc: It's a debate as old as Formula 1 itself - which F1 car is the best looking? Throughout the last 70 years we've seen some real beauties, as well as some cars we'd rather we hadn't... but this time we're focussing on the top 10 cars we'll never get tired of looking at, ranging from more recent modern icons all the way back to the classics in the 50s. Thanks to Duke Archives for footage from their documentary "If You're Not Winning... You're Not Trying", following the Lotus team behind the scenes in 1973 as they win the Constructors Championship. To see more of this, check out the full documentary here:...

programme.title: How NOT to drive around Monaco
programme.desc: Prepare for a Monaco Grand Prix track guide with a difference: As we take you around a full lap on the streets of Monte Carlo, Jake Boxall-Legge stops off at each corner to recall some of the famous incidents to have happened between the walls over the years. It's not just the well-known crashers who get it wrong here - as our guide shows, even the absolute best in F1 history have ended up in Monaco's barriers

programme.title: Regrets, Family and Ducati: A Deep-Dive with MotoGP's Marc Marquez
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Uri Puigdemont sits down with eight-time World Champion and newest Ducati MotoGP rider, Marc Marquez. In it, Marc talks about his career-defining switch from Honda to Ducati in 2023, the relationship between himself and brother Alex as they both compete for the sport’s greatest prize, how his family are dealing with the fights on-track, and how he’s getting along with new teammate Francesco Bagnaia. There’s also a deep-dive into Marquez’s mentality, from the recent chaos of that aborted start in Austin, the crash that ended his perfect start to 2025, and what Marc would tell his 18 year old self, nearly 15 years after his first World Championship in the 125cc...

programme.title: Giorgio Piola: Illustrating Speed
programme.desc: For nearly 50 years Giorgio Piola has been the foremost technical journalist in Formula 1. He has attended more Grands Prix than anyone in history. This film looks at the remarkable career of this legend.

programme.title: 2025 Hail International Rally - Full Review
programme.desc: All the highlights from the 2025 Hail International Rally in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: 1000 Lakes Rally 1986
programme.desc: The Italian Lancia and the French Peugeot teams came to the renowned 1000 Lakes Rally hotly disputing the manufacturers' title, with Markku Alen matched against Timo Salonen. Peugeot, however, had another ace in the pack in the shape of 27 year-old rising local star Juha Kankkunen, who was looking extremely good for the drivers' championship. This video captures in enthralling fashion the red-hot battle through the Finnish forests, with their huge ‘yumps’ and flat-out straights. Always a rally to set the pulses racing, Alen had the Lancia Delta running at its best and his ability to control the S4 at seemingly impossible speeds and angles will amaze the viewer. Supporting him would be...

programme.title: Race Rewind: Mexico City's road-course rumble
programme.desc: Relive the 2025 Viva Mexico 250 at Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez in Mexico City, where the road-course aces showed off.

programme.title: Michael Schumacher at Le Mans
programme.desc: In 1991, before his stellar F1 career, Michael Schumacher raced for Mercedes at Le Mans - and had a legitimate shot at winning the most prestigious endurance race in the World. Autosport Editor-in-Chief Kevin Turner narrates the story of this dramatic race, and explains how the lessons Schumacher learnt in these 900bhp cars shaped his career in F1, and assisted him in some of his most famous races.

programme.title: Leclerc Looks Back at Highlights from his F1 Career
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc has had some huge moments in his career, from spectacular wins to helping the team develop even before he raced for Ferrari's F1 team. We sat down with Leclerc and brought him 5 photos from his career, asking him to pinpoint where he was and why each photo is so special to him.

programme.title: It's Time To Get Excited About Hydrogen Powered Race Cars
programme.desc: Hydrogen power is developing at a breakneck speed, and for Motorsport development, AVL is leading the charge. We visited AVL's headquarters in Graz, Austria, to find out just how they're developing a Hydrogen powered race car, and how it compares to the real thing in their state-of-the-art simulator. Thanks to AVL for providing access to their HQ and for sponsoring this video!

programme.title: When broken Porsches staggered to Le Mans victory
programme.desc: With 9 Porsche 956s finishing in the top 10, the 1983 24 Hours of Le Mans was a truly remarkable feat for Porsche. But just exactly how did they win? In this episode of “Short View Back to the Past”, Autosport Chief Editor Kevin Turner recalls the time that a very broken Porsche 956 won Le Mans.

programme.title: What REALLY Happened when F1 Drivers Went On Strike
programme.desc: Being a Formula 1 driver is one of those dream jobs, but that doesn’t mean everything always runs smoothly. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when the F1 drivers went on strike.

programme.title: How Do F1 Teams Test & Develop Components?
programme.desc: Putting components through their paces to maximise reliability and performance! Mike Elliott, Technology Director, talks us through what happens in the Test & Development department!

programme.title: Giorgio Piola's incredible career in motorsport
programme.desc: For the last 40 years, Giorgio has profiled every change in design and engineering for every car on the grid. Here we take a look at his incredible career.

programme.desc: Watch race 2 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.desc: In 1991, before his stellar F1 career, Michael Schumacher raced for Mercedes at Le Mans - and had a legitimate shot at winning the most prestigious endurance race in the World. Autosport Editor-in-Chief Kevin Turner narrates the story of this dramatic race, and explains how the lessons Schumacher learnt in these 900bhp cars shaped his career in F1, and assisted him in some of his most famous races.

programme.title: Leclerc Looks Back at Highlights from his F1 Career
programme.desc: Charles Leclerc has had some huge moments in his career, from spectacular wins to helping the team develop even before he raced for Ferrari's F1 team. We sat down with Leclerc and brought him 5 photos from his career, asking him to pinpoint where he was and why each photo is so special to him.

programme.title: It's Time To Get Excited About Hydrogen Powered Race Cars
programme.desc: Hydrogen power is developing at a breakneck speed, and for Motorsport development, AVL is leading the charge. We visited AVL's headquarters in Graz, Austria, to find out just how they're developing a Hydrogen powered race car, and how it compares to the real thing in their state-of-the-art simulator. Thanks to AVL for providing access to their HQ and for sponsoring this video!

programme.title: When broken Porsches staggered to Le Mans victory
programme.desc: With 9 Porsche 956s finishing in the top 10, the 1983 24 Hours of Le Mans was a truly remarkable feat for Porsche. But just exactly how did they win? In this episode of “Short View Back to the Past”, Autosport Chief Editor Kevin Turner recalls the time that a very broken Porsche 956 won Le Mans.

programme.title: What REALLY Happened when F1 Drivers Went On Strike
programme.desc: Being a Formula 1 driver is one of those dream jobs, but that doesn’t mean everything always runs smoothly. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when the F1 drivers went on strike.

programme.title: How Do F1 Teams Test & Develop Components?
programme.desc: Putting components through their paces to maximise reliability and performance! Mike Elliott, Technology Director, talks us through what happens in the Test & Development department!

programme.title: Giorgio Piola's incredible career in motorsport
programme.desc: For the last 40 years, Giorgio has profiled every change in design and engineering for every car on the grid. Here we take a look at his incredible career.

programme.title: Round 2: Velocitta - Race 2 (EN)
programme.desc: Watch race 2 of the second round of the 2025 Porsche Carrera Cup Brasil season at Autódromo Velocitta.

programme.title: Regrets, Family and Ducati: A Deep-Dive with MotoGP's Marc Marquez
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Uri Puigdemont sits down with eight-time World Champion and newest Ducati MotoGP rider, Marc Marquez. In it, Marc talks about his career-defining switch from Honda to Ducati in 2023, the relationship between himself and brother Alex as they both compete for the sport’s greatest prize, how his family are dealing with the fights on-track, and how he’s getting along with new teammate Francesco Bagnaia. There’s also a deep-dive into Marquez’s mentality, from the recent chaos of that aborted start in Austin, the crash that ended his perfect start to 2025, and what Marc would tell his 18 year old self, nearly 15 years after his first World Championship in the 125cc...

programme.title: Giorgio Piola: Illustrating Speed
programme.desc: For nearly 50 years Giorgio Piola has been the foremost technical journalist in Formula 1. He has attended more Grands Prix than anyone in history. This film looks at the remarkable career of this legend.

programme.title: 2025 Hail International Rally - Full Review
programme.desc: All the highlights from the 2025 Hail International Rally in Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: 1000 Lakes Rally 1986
programme.desc: The Italian Lancia and the French Peugeot teams came to the renowned 1000 Lakes Rally hotly disputing the manufacturers' title, with Markku Alen matched against Timo Salonen. Peugeot, however, had another ace in the pack in the shape of 27 year-old rising local star Juha Kankkunen, who was looking extremely good for the drivers' championship. This video captures in enthralling fashion the red-hot battle through the Finnish forests, with their huge ‘yumps’ and flat-out straights. Always a rally to set the pulses racing, Alen had the Lancia Delta running at its best and his ability to control the S4 at seemingly impossible speeds and angles will amaze the viewer. Supporting him would be...

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: A Plea For Refuge
programme.desc: Two adventurous friends, Jeff Shapiro and Cody Tuttle, have a desire to experience one of the last, raw, and truly preserved wilderness areas on the North American continent, attempt to hike and fly paraglider's across the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.

programme.title: WHY WE FLY
programme.desc: Ever wondered what goes through someone’s mind as they jump from a helicopter above the Canadian Rockies? Then ride along with the Team KAVU athletes as they wingsuit, skydive, and speedride above scenic Fernie, British Columbia.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2023 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: Athlete Profile Marcel Remy
programme.desc: When you hear the name Remy, the first people climbers generally think of are Claude and Yves. For more than thirty years, Mammut has supported and accompanied the two climbers with their projects.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: 4Islands MTB Croatia
programme.desc: Das 4Islands MTB Croatia begrüßte über 400 Mountainbiker aus aller Welt zu einem fünftägigen Rennen auf vier kroatischen Inseln. Das Rennen führt über 291 km mit 6150 Höhenmetern und ist einzigartig, da die Fahrer auf dem Deck eines schwimmenden Bootes starten.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #01
programme.desc: Vodafone Queen & King of the Court wird seine Crown Series 2023 in Miami Beach, Florida, USA, starten. Die größten Stars des Beach-Volleyballs werden vom 9. bis 12. März 2023 anwesend sein.

programme.title: Titan Desert Series 2023 - Morocco
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge entdecken wir die ungezähmte Landschaft und die wunderschöne Wüste von Marokko. Wir machen einen 6-tägigen Mountainbike-Trip durch die spektakulären Sanddünen und werden beim diesjährigen Titan Desert 2023 epische Bike-Action erleben.

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria wird auch 2023 wieder die besten Beachtennis-Spieler der Welt mit der Sand Series ITF Beachtennis Gran Canaria empfangen. Der Strand von Las Canteras wird vom 9.-14. Mai den idealen Rahmen für eine Meisterschaft von internationalem Format bieten.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly & Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: One Water Race 2024
programme.desc: The concept is straight forward; starting at Arholma in the north, the first to reach Landsort in the south is crowned the winner. Running and swimming the only method of movement. No track and free choice of route but with some unknown check points needed to pass along the way.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024
programme.desc: World’s biggest long-distance triathlon: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024July 7th, 2024The world’s best athletes will conquer the traditional triathlon distance of 3.8 km swimming, 180 km cycling and 42.2 km running through the district of Roth in Bavaria, Germany.

programme.title: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX Highline World Championships 2024 will take place from July 17th to 21st in Laax, Switzerland, at the legendary GALAAXY on the summit of Crap Sogn Gion (2252m). The competition consists of two disciplines: Freestyle and Speed Highline.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Climbing Special - Worldwide
programme.desc: Kashmir, the Moab Desert, the famous Matterhorn, icefalls in Norway and Patagonia. We look back on breathtaking adventures, incredible alpine records and never-before-imagined new ascents

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2025 #23: Motosurf Grand Prix
programme.desc: The 2025 UIM MotoSurf World Championship-Fujairah Grand Prix took place from April 11-13 at Fujairah Corniche in the United Arab Emirates. This event marked the opening round of the 2025 MotoSurf season and attracted 80 riders from 18 countries

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: GKA Magazine #2 Kite-Surf World Cup
programme.desc: Auf der kapverdischen Insel Sal gibt es eine der besten Wellen der Welt. Ponta Preta erfreut sich perfekter rechtsdrehender Wellen, die sich um die felsige Landzunge winden. Für die Qatar Airways GKA World Tour ist es der ideale Ort, um die Kitesurf-Saison 2023 zu eröffnen.

programme.title: King of the Court 2023 - #02
programme.desc: Beachvolleyball der WeltklasseZum dritten Mal in Folge ist Hamburg Gastgeber eines Queen & King of the Court-Turniers. Vom 25. bis 28. Mai werden wieder die Besten der Besten in die Hafenstadt an der Elbe reisen, um die Titel der Königinnen und Könige zu erkämpfen.

programme.title: Golden Roof Challenge 2023 - Innsbruck (AUT)
programme.desc: Die Golden Roof Challenge, Home of the Golden Fly Series, ist eine weltbekannte Stabhochsprung- und Weitsprungsveranstaltung. Sie wird am 7. Juni zum 19. Mal im Herzen von Innsbruck, Österreich, ausgetragen.

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Highlight Show BMX
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship #1
programme.desc: Today we´re joining the World Downhill Skateboarding & Luge Championship in Erzincan, Turkey. Nestled in the heart of Eastern Anatolia, Erzincan’s breathtaking landscapes provide a stunning backdrop for this adrenaline-fueled competition.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Between Home
programme.desc: "Between Home" is an adventure documentary about Nick Jaffe. Nick decides to sail solo from the UK to Australia, negotiating the treacherous waters of the Pacific and Atlantic Oceans.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 5 & 6 - Belgium
programme.desc: Welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 5 and 6. We are at Spa-Francorchamps, in Belgium, the iconic circuit, for this event presented by EICMA. The UCI E-Mountain Bike Cross-Country World Cup comes to the spectacular woods of this world-famous venue for the third year

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Chasing Dreams -Episode 1
programme.desc: A thrilling journey through Chasing Dreams, where every trail becomes a battleground for victory. From the peaks of the Basque Country to the routes of Chamonix, witness the determination of trail runners as they chase their dreams on the Golden Trail World Series.

programme.desc: Motorsurf World Championship #1 - Fujairah (UAE) You’ve probably asked yourself many times what to do if you want to surf but the swell isn’t good enough. The athletes from the Motosurf World Championship have the answer. So let´s check out how they performed in Fujairah.

programme.title: Pasko the Magic Move
programme.desc: Recovering from testicular cancer, professional athlete and filmmaker Maarten Molenaar embarks on a journey to Fuerteventura to learn a new freestyle windsurfing trick - the Pasko.

programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.desc: Nach einem spannenden Mai, in dem die Sand Series Gran Canaria Classic und die Beach Tennis World Championships in zwei aufeinanderfolgenden Wochen stattfanden, reisen die Spielerinnen nach Brasilien zur dritten Ausgabe der Sand Series Brasilia Classic.

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour - Vieste (ITA)

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!
